title: Disclaimer & Regulatory Information
intro: By accessing rupietimes.com, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by the terms of this disclaimer and user notice.

sections.title: General Information
sections.content:
Rupie Times is a digital financial publication owned and operated by Time Craft, a media publication. The content published on this website, newsletters, and associated platforms is for *general information, market analysis and educational purposes only*. We collect, compile, and present data and insights from reliable public sources, research reports and expert opinions. While every effort is made to ensure accuracy and timeliness, *Rupie Times does not guarantee the completeness, correctness, or reliability of any information contained herein*.

The views and opinions expressed by authors, analysts, or contributors are their own and do not necessarily reflect the views of Rupie Times or its management. Readers are advised to *exercise discretion and verify information independently before making any financial or investment decisions*.

sections.title: Nature of Content
sections.content:
The articles, stories, or analyses published on Rupie Times are journalistic and educational in nature. They are intended to provide readers with context, perspective, and understanding of financial developments.

*Nothing on this website constitutes investment advice, recommendation, or solicitation to buy or sell securities, mutual funds, derivatives, or any other financial instruments.*

Rupie Times is a digital financial publication and *does not provide regulated investment advisory, portfolio management, or financial planning services*. Any information published is for general informational purposes only. Readers are advised to seek guidance from a *SEBI-registered Investment Adviser or Research Analyst* for investment decisions specific to their financial goals and risk profile.

sections.title: Regulatory & Compliance Position
sections.content:
Our publication and its contributors operate solely in the domain of *financial journalism and information dissemination*. Rupie Times does not engage in regulated investment advisory or research activities.

Any analytical views, sector reviews, or opinions published are meant for *informational and educational purposes only* and must not be interpreted as a registered advisory or research service.

In cases where content from third-party *SEBI-registered advisers or analysts* is featured, the source and SEBI registration details (as provided by the contributor) will be clearly disclosed.

Rupie Times acts only as a *publishing platform* for such material and has *no financial interest* in the securities or recommendations discussed therein.

sections.title: Independence and Conflicts of Interest
sections.content:
Rupie Times operates *independently of all brokerages, promoters, corporates, or financial institutions*.

Editorial decisions are taken *without any influence from advertisers or market participants*.

We do not accept *compensation, inducement, or consideration of any kind* that is linked to the performance of any security, company, or trading activity.

sections.title: Sponsored & Partner Content
sections.content:
Certain articles or features may be presented in association with brands or advertisers. All such content will be clearly labeled as *“Sponsored”, “Advertorial”, or “Partner Content.”*

Sponsored articles are provided *for information only* and do not represent the editorial opinion of Rupie Times. They should not be construed as *investment recommendations or endorsements*.

sections.title: Forward-Looking Statements
sections.content: Some articles may include *forward-looking views or projections* based on current market trends, data, or expectations. Such statements involve risks and uncertainties, and actual results may differ materially. *Rupie Times assumes no obligation to update such statements*.

sections.title: Third-Party Links & External Content
sections.content:
RupieTimes.com may contain hyperlinks to *third-party websites* for reader convenience.

Rupie Times is *not responsible for the content, accuracy, or reliability of external sites*, nor does inclusion imply endorsement. Users access such sites *at their own risk*.

sections.title: Data, Tools & Delivery
sections.content:
Market data, charts, and indicators may be sourced from *third-party vendors and public platforms*.

While we aim to provide accurate information, *we do not guarantee uninterrupted service or real-time accuracy*.

Delivery of newsletters, email alerts, or notifications may be *delayed or disrupted* due to internet, network, or technical issues beyond our control.

sections.title: Risk Disclosure
sections.content:
*Stock market investing and trading involve substantial risk of loss.* Past performance is not indicative of future results.

Mid-cap, small-cap, and sectoral investments may show *higher volatility and liquidity risks*.

Readers are urged to perform *independent due diligence* and seek advice from *qualified professionals* before acting on any information provided herein.

sections.title: Liability Limitation
sections.content:
Rupie Times, its owners, editors, and contributors shall *not be liable* for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages, loss of profit, or loss of data arising from the use of our content or services.

Readers use all information *at their own risk and discretion*.

sections.title: Copyright & Ownership
sections.content: All text, graphics, and design elements appearing on RupieTimes.com are the *property of Rupie Times Media* unless otherwise stated. *Unauthorized reproduction, redistribution, or modification* of content in any form is prohibited without written permission.

sections.title: Jurisdiction
sections.content:
This website is operated and managed from *India*.

All matters, claims, or disputes shall fall under the *exclusive jurisdiction of courts in Mumbai, India*, and governed by the laws of the *Republic of India*.
